vulnerability_description: Multiple NetApp products incorporate Apache Tapestry. Apache Tapestry versions 5.4.0 prior to 5.6.4 and 5.7.0 prior to 5.7.2 are susceptible to a vulnerability which when successfully exploited could lead to disclosure of sensitive information.
vulnerability_remediation: Be updated with the latest version
impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to disclosure of sensitive information.
